author: costin
msg: Handler will slowly replace ServletWrapper. Various "special" functionality
( reloading, class loading, unavailable) will be moved in interceptors,
and "special" types of handlers will be separate subclasses ( JspHandler,

author: costin
msg: - moved up WebXml reader - it does read context config, all other modules depend on it.
- strange, the workdir setting was in DefaultCMSetter instead of WorkDirInterceptor.
- in AccessInterceptor, moved the mapping to requestMap callback, so the information about
required roles and transport is available to auth modules
- leave SSL out of EmbededTomcat till we finish debugging the rest - it adds few seconds
- added code to finish context removal.

author: shachor
msg: Logging improvements and bof bug fix
